sourcesContent:
<template>

    <mdb-list-group>
        <comment v-for="(comment, index) in comments"
                 :key="index"
                 :comment="comment"
                 />
    </mdb-list-group>

</template>

<script>
    // row and col for scrollbar
    import { mdbListGroup } from 'mdbvue';
    import Comment from "./Comment";

    export default {
        name: "comment-list",
        props: ["comments"],
        components: {
            mdbListGroup,
            Comment
        },
        data() {
            return {}
        },
        methods: {
            /* eslint-disable no-console */
        }
    }
</script>

<style scoped>

    comment {
        margin-top: 1em;
    }

    .list-group-item:first-child, .list-group-item:last-child {
        border-radius: 0.5em;
    }

    ul li {
        margin: 0em 1em 1em 1em;
        padding: 2em;
        border-radius: 0.5em;
    }

    list {
        margin-bottom: 5em;
    }

</style>
